description: One level that is defined by a series, each of which contains the pages for the level.

index.description: An integer indicating the index of the series that defines this Series level within a TiffSeries.

shape.description: A tuple indicating the shape of the image data in the TiffPages of the level.

page_count.description: The count of the pages within this series

tiffpage_count.description: The count of the TiffPage within this series

tifframe_count.description: The count of the TiffFrame within this series

level_index.description: The index of the level indicating its order within the levels

pages.description: A list of TiffPages that make up the level within a TiffSeries.

frames.description: A list of TiffFrames that occur in a TiffSeries.
